name: The Quest: Rise of Emodo (Suspended)
blurb: More than a Game. Trade. Make Alliances. Unlock  Secrets and Shape your Destiny.

rewards.reward: No Reward

HERO: Welcome to Emodo. You clearly have a passion and wish you could do more. That\u2019s all the House of Qerah needs to know. She will add your name and profile to the wall of heroes within the game. Plus you are more than welcome at our interactive Developer Briefings and to test the Beta version

XENARI: In the game a Tsarak trader will give you a Xenari Amulet. This will improve the chances of you you finding valuable Xenari Fragments, which ultimately enable you to acquire Realm Keys. We also give you the HERO Reward. ____________________________ \r\nPlease Note: This is a new reward and is now included as a benefit in the ENERGIZE Reward. Please see FAQs for more info.\r\n____________________________

ENERGIZE: Qetoos are the life force of Emodo and without them your game is over. To honor you, when you start playing the game we will give you an exclusive (to backers) Quest Shaper called 'Insider'. This gives you a random award of 1 to 50 Qetoos every day. We also give you the HERO reward.

EPIC: Vlado Hudec will design the music for Rise of Emodo and it promises to be awesome. Here we give you access to a digital download of the original music designed for The Quest. Oh yes, we also give you the ENERGIZE reward too.

EVOLUTION: We send you a digital copy of a beautiful 100-page, full color book: \u2018Evolution Emodo\u2019 showing concept art, storyboards, timeline, doodles, behind the scenes stuff, interviews with the leading people designing the game and lots of other cool things. We will even list your name (or a business name) inside the book! We also send give you the EPIC reward.

THE T: Seems like everyone has a T-shirt. Well, we haven\u2019t designed ours yet but we will during this campaign - with your help!  I\u2019m sure we will even find a good looking model to wear one for you (you don\u2019t get to keep the model). So for $24.00 you get the T and everything in the EVOLUTION reward too.

THE ORB: We know how stressful playing a game can be so we've commissioned an exclusive stress ball to send to you. Inspired by the Orb Ikaran, this life-saver will keep you sane as you seek to become the Kemet-Akra. Naturally you aso receive all previous rewards.

EARTH-KAN: Sometimes Earth-Persons are miserable creatures, stuck in the far-reaches of space or lost somewhere in time. They need a friendly face and that\u2019s where you come in. Share your excitement and give them a dose of positive energy. KAN is the Emodon word for \u2018success\u2019 and this reward will give you success beyond your wildest dreams. First we give you everything from \u2018THE ORB\u2019 reward and 3000 bonus Qetoos too. Then we connect you to 30 Earth-Persons who are playing Rise of Emodo. Send them a positive vibe and watch your Qetoos soar. Plus expect a few special bonuses too. OH YES, THIS IS AN EARLY BIRD OFFER.

EMODON: One morning you decide that Emodo would become your new home. Select your exclusive screen-name AND choose one of the seven Emodon tribes. This gives you a range of exclusive benefits when trading with other members of your tribe - including free clues, bonus Realm Keys and good Quest Shapers. We also give you the EARTH-KAN reward.
____________________________ 
Please note that this is a new reward and is now included in all the rewards below.
____________________________

SHADOW: The Shadow D'harblus was created in the Age of Wars as a weapon of stealth. Exiled for 32,000 years, he became a master of everything. Now he heads the feared Guild of Thieves and he's seeking fresh recruits from Earth. He promises you nothing but a secret life in the shadows where you seek to deflect other Earth-Persons from their path on The Quest. He also promises you a stream of Qetoos. Although you receive all the benefits of the EARTH-KAN reward and EMODON reward, you lose the in-game role of Earth-Kan and your tribe will become the D'harblus. \r\n____________________________ \r\nPlease note that this is a new reward and is now optional in all the rewards below. ____________________________

QUEST: Evolution. Discovery. Breakthrough. Survival. War. Earth... Across 90,000 years, so many events have shaped Emodo. We are going to send you a personalized and signed print from the timeline. Uniquely this will include a puzzle (embedded into the print). When you solve it you unlock Realm Keys, Xenari Fragments and Qetoos. \r\n____________________________ \r\nPlease note that this is a new reward. You receive everything from the EMODON reward. The SHADOW reward is optional. The QUEST reward is also added to all the rewards below. ____________________________

SEEKER: The ancient Xenari emerged from the forests of Sanrsah some 60,000 years ago and they evolved into the seven tribes of Emodo. We are going to send you a hard-copy version of our beautiful 100-page, full color book: \u2018Evolution Emodo\u2019 showing concept art, storyboards, timeline, doodles, behind the scenes stuff, interviews with the leading people designing the game and lots of other cool things. We will even list your name (or a business name) inside the book! Then we will get as many people involved with the project as possible to sign your book and also personalize it to you. We also give you everything from the EARTH-KAN reward plus ANOTHER 3000 Qetoos (6000 in total) and your Insider wildcard (from the ENERGIZE reward) now gives you a random reward of 50 to 300 Qetoos every day.

SECRETS: Shhh. Tell no one. Perhaps the coolest reward ever; the EneKai recruit you into the Guild of Secrets. Discover the art of creating mind-bending puzzles and then generate thousands of Qetoos every day as you become a hidden power behind The Quest.
____________________________ 
Please note that this is a new reward. You receive everything from the SEEKER reward.  The SECRETS reward is also added to all the rewards below. Please look for update SR5 for more info.
 ____________________________

ENHANCED: The Endrazdos come from the frozen lands to the south and for millennia they have designed most of the architecture of Emodo. Now they create Quest Shapers: wildcards which change the dynamics of your game. The Endrazdos will welcome you to their maze-like temple and work with you to design an exclusive Quest Shaper. You decide its power and name. Whenever a player uses your Quest Shaper you make a bonus Qetoo. And, yes, you do get everything from the SEEKER reward.

DISCOVERED: We send you a limited edition, signed print from the world of Emodo created by Tad Davis, Jonathan Roberts, Andrea Pua or Alex Ruiz. You choose the artwork you want and we do the rest.
____________________________ 
Please note that this is a new reward. You receive everything from the ENHANCED reward too. This reward is also added to the WOVEN Rewards.
____________________________

WOVEN 1: The advanced moon of Emodo has generated many stories and in the WOVEN series of rewards we give you something exceptional. Here, we create a story about you and plant you somewhere in the past 24,000 years. Players of Rise of Emodo will discover you in the House of Qerah. Here\u2019s your chance to get something that games seldom give you: a chance for your name to live forever... You also get a copy of the story created for you, signed by the writer. Plus we give you ANOTHER 3000 Qetoos (9000 in total) and everything from the ENHANCED reward!

WOVEN 2: Your story is more than a chance encounter as you become interwoven into the fabric of the game. Dependent upon the decisions made by players of Rise of Emodo your story becomes part of their Quest: an answer which takes them closer to solving the Orb Ikaran. You also get a copy of the story created for you, signed by the writer. Plus we give you ANOTHER 3000 Qetoos (12000 in total) and everything from the ENHANCED reward too and FREE SHIPPING from this reward onwards!

WOVEN 3: Your story gains an enhanced weave as you become a key character within the world of Emodo. Now every player of Rise of Emodo will encounter you within their Quest as they seek to solve the Orb Ikaran. You also get a copy of the story created for you, signed by the writer. Plus we give you ANOTHER 6000 Qetoos (18000 in total) and everything from the ENHANCED reward too.

THE OSHAI: We give you membership of the Oshai (Guild of Merchants) which would normally cost 10,000 Qetoos. Membership comes loaded with in-game benefits: especially against rogue trades. As a special reward the Oshai will give you one Realm Key: an incredible leap forward in your game. In fact the Oshai are so impressed that you will be recognized as development partner as the Emodon seek evermore Earth-Persons. Plus we give you ANOTHER 12000 Qetoos (30000 in total) and everything from the ENHANCED reward and any of the WOVEN rewards. Cool eh?

DISCOVERY: An exceptional reward, aimed at Business Members and Good Causes, we develop an interwoven story about your brand and embed you into the game. Imagine potentially tens of thousands of members solving puzzles which are designed around your business brand and profile. There are many things that every player must complete in order to progress and now, discovering your business name within the game will become part of that experience. You decide the prize (Realm Key, Quest Shaper, Qetoos etc). Plus you have everything from the OSHAI reward.

EARTH TRIBE: For thousands of years the Xenari Temple has provided leadership for Emodo. Now, from 30703 XT Earth-Persons are free to enter. Choose this reward and your name will be translated into Emodon. An artifact or landmark will then be created for you and woven into the game. This will generate thousands of Qetoos for you when discovered by others seeking the Orb Ikaran. Beyond this, you also receive everything from the OSHAI reward (DISCOVERY is optional) and become a valued member of our awareness team. Your ideas will be considered and whenever possible we will Skype or meet in person.

EMODO TRIBE: Instead of becoming an Earth-Person within the Xenari Temple you choose to represent one of the seven tribes of Emodo. Whenever Earth-Persons interact with any aspect of your chosen tribe you generate potentially millions of Qetoos. Beyond this, we will also ask Vlado Hudec to design a piece of music and name this after you, your business or a loved one. This will be used within the game and we will provide you with a digital copy, along with all other tracks Vlado creates exclusively for us. You also receive everything from the OSHAI reward (DISCOVERY is optional) and naturally, you will become a valued member of our awareness team. Your ideas will be considered and whenever possible we will Skype or meet in person.

MIROQ MASTER: Deep in the Cave of Arkat, the EneKai discovered shimmering pools of energy. They were portals and they became known as the 'Miroq''. You receive the EMODO TRIBE reward but also become an integral part of our marketing and awareness team, seeking a stream of new Earth-Persons. You will interact with our team every week and face to face meetings are also possible.

ARCHITECT: Six years ago the Questorian Nemiba discovered that an advanced alien race known as the Architects were responsible for the storm of rocks which had so often shaped Emodo. She also discovered that these were the same aliens seen in the skies of Earth 24,000 years previously. As an Architect you help create the storyline and artwork for Chapter 2. You will be involved in day to day meetings and there will definitely be a face to face meeting involved. Naturally you also take the EMODO TRIBE reward (MIROQ MASTER is optional). We also list you as a development partner and aim to make every day an exciting journey into the world of Emodo.
